entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.4°C

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
